title: Flag of Andorra
cardDescription: The flag of Andorra is a vertical tricolor of blue, yellow, and red with the coat of arms of Andorra in the center.
description: The flag of Andorra is a vertical tricolor of blue, yellow, and red with the coat of arms of Andorra in the center.

content.content: In the actual flag the three vertical stripes are not of equal width. Their official ratio is 8:9:8 so yellow bar is slightly wider. The scale of this pattern is too small to take that into account though.
This pattern is worked vertically starting from bottom left.

content: With A, ch 19, sc in 2nd ch and each ch across, turn
Ch 1, sc 5, [sbd, sc 1, sdb, sc 1] x 2, sc 5, turn
Ch 1, sc 5, sbd, sc 4, sdb, sc 7, turn
Ch 1, sc 5, sbd, sc 1, sdc, sc 1, scb, sbd, sdb, sc 6, turn
Ch 1, sc 4, sbd, sc 1, sdc, scb, sbc, scd, sc 1, sdb, sc 6, turn
Ch 1, sc 5, sbd, sc 1, sdb, sbc, scb, sbd, sdb, sc 6, turn
Ch 1, sc 5, sbd, sc 4, sdb, sc 7, turn
Ch 1, sc 5, [sbd, sc 1, sdb, sc 1] x 2, sc 5, turn

content.content: For help with the pattern, please see the General Instructions from the main page:
